title: Advantech iView PSTable getPSInventoryExportData SQL Injection Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description:
This vulnerability allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code on affected installations of Advantech iView. Authentication is not required to exploit this vulnerability.
The specific flaw exists within the processing of calls to the getPSInventoryExportData method of the PSTable class. When parsing the query HTTP parameter, the process does not properly validate a user-supplied string before using it to construct SQL queries. An attacker can leverage this vulnerability to execute code in the context of SYSTEM.
addtionnal_details: Advantech has issued an update to correct this vulnerability. More details can be found at:https://us-cert.cisa.gov/ics/advisories/icsa-20-196-33
timeline:
2020-04-24 - Vulnerability reported to vendor
2020-07-16 - Coordinated public release of advisory
